Controllers

Class SignUpController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.SignUpController

  • public class SignUpController
extends java.lang.Object
    Sign Up Controller Allows a user to create their own profile. Saves the user's file and a security token, then logs the user in.
    See Also:
    Login, CheckSecurityToken, SecurityToken, User

    • Method Detail

      • addProvider

        public static void addProvider(java.lang.String UserID,
                               java.lang.String Email,
                               java.lang.String Phone,
                               android.content.Context context)
                        throws UserIDMustBeAtLeastEightCharactersException,
                               NoConnectionInSignUpException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException,
                               java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                               UserAlreadyExistsException
        adds a Provider to the system. Also generates a security token for this new Provider and saves a copy to disk
        Parameters:
        UserID - UserID of new Provider
        Email - Email of new Provider
        Phone - Phone number of new Provider
        context -
        Throws:
        UserIDMustBeAtLeastEightCharactersException - UserID must be >= 8 chars
        NoConnectionInSignUpException - If no connection, cannot ensure unique UserIDs
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        UserAlreadyExistsException - UserID is already in use

      • addPatient

                       throws UserIDMustBeAtLeastEightCharactersException,
                              NoConnectionInSignUpException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException,
                              java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                              UserAlreadyExistsException
        adds a Patient to the system. Also generates a security token for this new Patient and saves a copy to disk
        Parameters:
        UserID - UserID of new Patient
        Email - Email of new Patient
        Phone - Phone number of new Patient
        context -
        Throws:
        UserIDMustBeAtLeastEightCharactersException - UserID must be >= 8 chars
        NoConnectionInSignUpException - If no connection, cannot ensure unique UserIDs
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        UserAlreadyExistsException - UserID is already in use
